code: import axios from"axios";import{URL}from"../../../../../../apis";export var postFavorite=function postFavorite(token,slug){return axios.post("".concat(URL,"/api/articles/").concat(slug,"/favorite"),{"Access-Control-Allow-Origin":"*","Access-Control-Allow-Credentials":true},{headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json",Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}});};export var deleteFavorite=function deleteFavorite(token,slug){return axios.delete("".concat(URL,"/api/articles/").concat(slug,"/favorite"),{headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json",Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}});};
